Title: Requires enhanced federal medical assistance percentage funds be directly shared with the counties and the city of New York
Summary: Requires enhanced federal medical assistance percentage funds be directly shared with the counties and the city of New York; requires the comptroller examine and audit all funds received from the enhanced federal medical assistance percentage and the distributions made to counties and the city of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง363-a, Soc Serv L; amd ยง8, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the state finance law, in relation to requiring enhanced federal medical assistance percentage funds be directly shared with the counties and the city of New York
